mapper.select: select department,auditor,mailAddress,name,jmt from report where jmt between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and department=#{department} and state='未审核' ORDER BY jmt;
select department,auditor,mailAddress,name,jmt from report where jmt between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and department=#{department} and state='未审核' ORDER BY jmt limit #{offset},#{total};
select count(*) from report where jmt between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and department=#{department} and state='未审核';
